oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Identification discs (dog tags) of Pvt. Euliss Grant Hallowell
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Euliss Grant Hallowell was from Carroll County, Tenn. The discs are aluminum and on a non-period beaded chain. His name and U S A are on one side and his serial number 3238612 is on the reverse. Hallowell served in the 63rd Art. Brig., Coastal Art. Corps. He deployed to Europe in September 1918 and remained overseas until March 1919. After the war he returned to Huntington and to farming. He died in 1984.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
